Body: The Reason Crypto is a Big Deal in Georgia   The country of Georgia is mainly known for its wine, hospitality and most recently, for its blossoming cryptocurrency hub. One usually thinks of crypto mining operations and they look to countries like Iceland and China. However, they do not know that the historic country of Georgia, situated in Eastern Europe, is ranked the second most profitable area in the world for cryptocurrency mining just below the China margin.  Why is This Important?  Sure, Georgia is doing good and over the past few years, bitcoin and cryptocurrency miners have been flocking over here due to the country‚Äôs lack of regulations and inexpensive hydropower, but what does that have to do with ICO projects and Bixtrim in General? Let us explain ourselves.  Regulations (or the lack of them)   According to Invest in Georgia, the Georgian liberal trade laws provide investors with an opportunity to not only to reach up to 4.4 million residents, but also broaden regional markets, as a result of the absence of customs and import duties.  As of today, Georgia has signed a free trade agreement with some of the CIS countries including Ukraine, Belarus, Moldova, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan, both with its neighbors Turkey, Azerbaijan and Armenia.   Raising Awareness  The implementation of various fintech solutions is seen by many libertarians positively. Cryptocurrency is the main topic of discussion and can be clearly seen from the many Blockchain events taking place in the capital. One example of this can be Blockchain & Bitcoin Tbilisi, where Bixtrim was the main sponsor and speaker.   Accessibility  The last part is where we come in. Even though Cryptocurrencies and Blockchain technologies are growing rapidly in Georgia (and not only) there are still a number of accessibility issues. Author: bixtrimplatform
Title: Bixtrim - Advanced Crypto-Exchange Platform for Everyone!
Body: https://scontent.ftbs5-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/37050607_1362404273892446_3961791096412962816_o.png?_nc_cat=0&oh=8e3375e5bf21a7468ede2bfcab479a68&oe=5B9DD2BA  Introducing Bixtrim, an advanced multi functional crypto-exchange platform with perfected versions of functions generally found in exchange platforms.  Bixtrim is an exchange platform, based in Tbilisi, Georgia. Our exchange platform supports Crypto to Fiat transfers and vice versa. We are also partnering with 40 other exchange platforms ensuring fast and easy access to your wallet.  Our platform will also cover:  Upgraded version of functions that are usually used in the exchange platforms Unique possibilities sets, such as:     - Crypto pawn shop     - Futures contracts     - New cryptocurrency supporting escrow and multi-factor authentication     - Debit cards that are directly connected to the cryptocurrency wallets     - Bixtrim functional tree  Being crypto enthusiasts ourselves, we have seen a number of problems in the industry we are eager to solve, here are some of them!  Analysis and methods of the market problems solutions:  Problem - slow cash withdrawal from the cryptocurrency Bixtrim solution - Using the accounts from the different banks in order to maximally use money transfer modern methods for fast transfer. Through our accounting network we will find the fastest way to your bank account.  Problem - Potential profit loss for the tokens owners Bixtrim solution - A crypto pawn shop will be developed, where coin owners can pawn them for a period of time and get them back after paying off the fees. This service allows customers to keep coins, as sell as get the needed cash for a short-term and profit in a long term.  Problem - absence of capability to make an exchange on the planned date Bixtrim solution  - We will develop futures contracts on a Bixtrim platform, that will support planned transactions dates. Every platform user will be able to use this function and easily trade/play. Every coins that are traded on the Bixtrim platform will support futures.  Problem - Limited connection between crypto market and retail market Bixtrim solution - We will release revolutionary plastic card that will be directly connected to the Bixtrim coin and other cryptocurrencies. This card will be available in the internet shops, ATMs, PoS terminals and will have high daily limit. The owners of the plastic cards will be able to make purchases or perform transactions anywhere and everywhere.  Problem - High taxation Bixtrim solution - Bixtrim plastic card connected directly to the cryptocurrency will solve the problem. There is no need to make any exchanges or transaction, cash is not used and shouldn`t be declared as an income. Bixtrim card will help to get rid of the additional taxes and perform transactions/payments in coins using this card.  Our own tokens - BXM:  Releasing the BXM tokens, Bixtrim proposes new possibilities for investments in the future financial profit and also plans to develop unique multifunctional platform with new possibilities and functions that ease and simplify cryptocurrency transactions, providing simplicity and comfort for our clients who transfer funds.  BXM token has an advantage by way of lower commissions which can be exchanged or sold - we offer a discount for up to 50% on our financial services.  Starting from January 2019 token owners will get possibility to exchange BXM tokens on the cryptocurrency with new capabilities and features that will be released by Bixtrim.    Token characteristics:  - Token name: BXM - Emission volume: 72 000 000 tokens - Blockchain platform: Ethereum - Token standart: ERC20  https://miro.medium.com/fit/c/1400/420/1*9zWTvTcw7hruS9chQxo1cg.png  What exactly are we?  Other than a group of people working towards fulfilling a shared vision, we are a revolutionary crypto-exchange platform based in Tbilisi, Georgia.  In 2016, our team started off its journey through mining and from that moment on we became familiar with this great part of the world. As owners of cryptocurrency, we were aware of the issues and updates around it, especially its relation to exchange. Of course, we wanted to have better use of crypto in our everyday lives and make it global with a multifunctional use to it. At first, that was the exact reason why we decided to create our own exchange platform, so we could give back to the community with our innovational ideas and decisions. As our team members met and exchanged ideas, we started to have a growing urge of realizing them. We decided to commence the ICO and provide liquidity to the functions we had in mind.  Why Should You Invest?  There are two main reasons one should be interested in joining the Bixtrim family.    Improvements  Helping improve the crypto world by supporting an exchange platform solving a number of issues and problems that are presented today.    Become a BXM Holder  Our tokens can give you exclusive discounts on transaction fees and our financial services, that is why the need of our token will always be there and the cost of it is not restricted.
